document.masterDocTitle: Further Indo-West Pacific palaemonoid shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonoidea), principally from the New Caledonian region

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Further Indo-West Pacific palaemonoid shrimps (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonoidea), principally from the New Caledonian region

bibRefCitation.author: Kemp S
bibRefCitation.refString: Kemp S. 1922. Notes on Crustacea Decapoda in the Indian Museum, XV: Pontoniinae. Records of the Indian Museum 24: 113 - 288. Figures 1 - 105, Plates 3 - 9.

Remarks Previously recorded from Philippines , from
14 ° 009N
, 120 ° 169E ( Bruce 1981a ), Indonesia ,

Type locality: Laccadive
Sea, 9 ° 349570N, 70 ° 369300E,
930 m
(erroneously given as
90 ° N
in Bruce 1996 ). Also previously reported from Philippines, Indonesia , Australia ( New South Wales ), and New Caledonia
.
